string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Through the Road to Oblivion1

After having regained my emotions, I was able go past the Door of Oblivion. Of course, I couldn't go beyond #m270030100#... If I want to go in further, I'll probably have to take another one of #b#p2140000##k's test...
#p2140000# said if I want to go in further, go to #b#m270030100##k and defeat #r999 #o8200009##k. \n\n#o8200009# #r#a35151##k
I defeated 999 #o8200009#. #p2140000# granted me permission. Of course, this permission only allows me to go up to #m270030200#.
It seems like your emotions have been thawed. Do you want to proceed further now? Of course, you'll have to take a test...
Then go to #b#m270030100##k and defeat the #r#o8200009##k. If you defeat #r999#k of them, I will grant you permission to continue.
That's too hard for you? That's too bad then. I guess that's just your limit.
You've defeated 999 #o8200009#. That's amazing. I grant you permission, just as I promised.
#dAs the representative of Rhinne, the Goddess of Time, I grant you permission to look back at your 2nd oblivion#k.
You can go on your way now. You should be able to go up till #b#m270030200##k. After that, you'll be blocked again. If you want to go further... you'll have to take a new test.
You haven't defeated #r999 #o8200009##k yet. I don't think you are strong enough to walk against the flow of the past yet.
